name: Zombie Apoco
description:
Fight through waves of zombies, bosses and see how long you can survive!

How many waves can you survive?

The map is a prototype for now. (More maps coming soon)

Controls:

WASD = Left,Right, Up, Down Movement

F = Interact/Buy

Left Click (Mouse) = Shoot

More controls coming soon

Prototype has the following features.

1. Enemy follow

2. Shooting

3. Buyable doors

4. Prototype map.

5. Wave Counter

Engine: Godot 3.4.4 Stable

NOTE: THERE IS ONLY 7 WAVES AS OF RIGHT NOW
